Mitch Daniels has said he won't make a decision about running for president until after this year's legislative season ends in April. If( Mitch Daniels ) runs, I think it's hard for Mike Huckabee , because all the financial base in Indiana would likely go to Mitch Daniels , Charlie Black said.
